name: Safe Surfing
description:
Safe Surfing is a retro style shooter where the player is protecting their computer from various viruses and malware that are trying to infect it! The player will learn about different viruses and gain abilities to keep their computer safe and secure!

Use W,A,S,D, or the Arrow Keys to move your ship, and press [ Space ] to fire your weapons.

PROGRAMMERS
